ROOT.GetLineInfo1: SELECT TOP 100 L.ID,L.NAME,L.VOLTAGE_TYPE,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B L WHERE L.START_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND L.END_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND L.ID NOT IN (SELECT ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_LINE_INFO) UNION ALL SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,L.VOLTAGE_TYPE,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B L WHERE L.START_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND L.END_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND L.ID NOT IN (SELECT ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_LINE_INFO)
ROOT.GetStationCoordinate: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,3002 as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B s
ROOT.GetStationCoordinateById: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s WHERE s.ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s WHERE s.ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s WHERE s.ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,3002 as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID,s.VOLTAGE_TYPE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B s WHERE s.ID={0}
ROOT.GetLineTower: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 0 AS ID,0 AS TOWERNAME,ISNULL(A.TOWERNO,D.TOWERNO) AS TOWERNO,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TOWER_B T LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower A ON T.ID=A.TOWER_ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower D ON T.ID=D.TOWER_ID WHERE (A.LINE_ID={0} OR D.LINE_ID={0}) ) T WHERE towerno>0 order by towerno
ROOT.GetEffectStation: SELECT S.ID,V.NAME AS VOLNAME,S.NAME,P.NAME AS GRIDNAME,M.NAME AS MANAGENAME FROM {0} JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B S ON {1} LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON S.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON S.PG_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_COMPANY_B M ON S.MANAGE_DEPT_ID=M.ID WHERE {2} ORDER BY V.NAME DESC,S.NAME
ROOT.GetEffectPlant: SELECT S.ID,T.NAME AS TYPENAME,V.NAME AS VOLNAME,S.NAME,P.NAME AS GRIDNAME FROM {0} JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B S ON {1} LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON S.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON S.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_PLANTSTATIONTYPE T ON S.PLANT_TYPE=T.CODE WHERE {2} ORDER BY V.NAME DESC,S.NAME
ROOT.GetLineInfo: SELECT {0} FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B WHERE {1} UNION ALL SELECT {0} FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B WHERE {1}
ROOT.GetAcLineTower: SELECT LINE_ID,TOWER_ID,TOWERNO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_R_TOWER ORDER BY LINE_ID,TOWERNO
ROOT.GetDcLineTower: SELECT LINE_ID,TOWER_ID,TOWERNO FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_R_TOWER ORDER BY LINE_ID,TOWERNO
